title: Pbe question
body: So I have a question about the Pbe. So I just signed up a couple days ago how long does it usually take to get accepted?

replies.body:
There's no set time. Some can get accepted within days, others can be months or not receive an invite as well. The criteria for how we choose testers changes quite frequently depending on what we're testing at the moment. In general, though, we look for really active players who are a positive influence on the community. 

Check out our [PBE FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ#top) for complete details on the system. Let me know if you have any other questions.
